original_text: The man who was being cruel to the other man pushed Moses away. He said to Moses, “You have no authority to rule us. You are not our judge.
korean_text: 그 동무를 해치는 사람이 모세를 밀어뜨려 이르되 누가 너를 관리와 재판장으로 우리 위에 세웠느냐

sentences.original_text: The man who was being cruel to the other man
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 사람에게 잔인하게 굴던 그 남자가

sentences.original_text: You have no authority to rule us
